entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQR.IFRS.0080.7937] ifrs-full:FinanceCosts has a value of -8,600,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value.
The properties of this ifrs-full:FinanceCosts fact are: Period :2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : intertekgroupplc:ConsolidatedIncomeStatementAxis=intertekgroupplc:SeperatelyDisclosedItemsMember Unit : GBP Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/2138003GAT25WW1RN369/2021-12-31/ESEF/GB/0/2138003GAT25WW1RN369-2021-12-31.zip/2138003GAT25WW1RN369-2021-12-31/reports/2138003GAT25WW1RN369-2021-12-31-T01.xhtml 12370

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 02 - Profit or loss but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent, ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0127.9597] The statement 02 - Profit or loss includes the concept ifrs-full:OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxHedgesOfNetInvestmentsInForeignOperations in the presentation tree. The filing uses an XBRL table called intertekgroupplc:ProfitOrLossTable to represent this statement. The table includes the dimensions intertekgroupplc:ConsolidatedIncomeStatementAxis. The statement presentation group 02 - Profit or loss includes a presentation concept called ifrs-full:OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxHedgesOfNetInvestmentsInForeignOperations. This concept has the following values associated with it that do not appear in the financial statement table intertekgroupplc:ProfitOrLossTable:
ifrs-full:OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxHedgesOfNetInvestmentsInForeignOperations = 4,000,000
The presentation concept is defined for the statement but no fact values are defined in the instance document that use this line item in the table intertekgroupplc:ProfitOrLossTable. If the concept appears in the financial statements table, then either a dimension or line item needs to be added to the structure of the definition linkbase that defines the statement. If the item is not represented on the financial statements, then the presentation item should be removed.
In this case the concept OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxHedgesOfNetInvestmentsInForeignOperations is missing from the definition linkbase table nd should be added.
Total Element : ifrs-full:OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxHedgesOfNetInvestmentsInForeignOperations Total period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions :
Rule Element Id:9597 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - http://xbrl.ifrs.org/taxonomy/2020-03-16/full_ifrs/full_ifrs-cor_2020-03-16.xsd 4032
